about_the_game:
This is a funny action game without language barriers.
Operate the phantom thief Bunny Moon to steal the treasures of each stage,
and watch Bunny Moon's fantasy adventure!

Time Thief is a 2D pixel action game.
Players operate the protagonist "Bunny Moon" entering the place of many guards,
to steal treasures from different eras.
But be careful, you are not the only trespasser in the game.


As a phantom thief, Bunny Moon has a variety of abilities to do her job.
Since the name of the game is Time Thief,
besides being able to travel through time, of course,
she can also stop time.


Become a Phantom Thief!
Use a variety of Phantom Thief abilities to steal all the treasures.
detailed_description:
Update Notes

Ver 1.3
- Fixed an unintended action in the stage 6 coffee table position.
- The stage 6 clock hints after the player sees the true portrait.

Ver 1.2
Update
- Add the Options menu to adjust the volume and treasure chest rewards.
- Replace "Perfect" voice.
Fix
- Fixed the problem that the game would freeze when leaving without getting the treasure.
- Fixed the problem that the hiding point on the right can be moved to the boss level of the 6th stage.
- Fixed an issue where the shop icon was incorrect.


About the Game

This is a funny action game without language barriers.
Operate the phantom thief Bunny Moon to steal the treasures of each stage,
and watch Bunny Moon's fantasy adventure!

Players operate the protagonist "Bunny Moon" entering the place of many guards,

But be careful, you are not the only trespasser in the game.


As a phantom thief, Bunny Moon has a variety of abilities to do her job.
Since the name of the game is Time Thief,
besides being able to travel through time, of course,

Become a Phantom Thief!
Use a variety of Phantom Thief abilities to steal all the treasures.
name: Time Thief

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Window7 SP1/WIN8/WIN10
  • Processor: 1.2 GHz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: This is a funny action game without language barriers. Operate the phantom thief Bunny Moon to steal the treasures of each stage, and watch Bunny Moon's fantasy adventure!
supported_languages:
English, Japanese*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Danish, Russian, Bulgarian, Hungarian, Turkish, Greek, Norwegian, Czech, Polish, Thai, Ukrainian, Swedish, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Romanian, Finnish, Dutch, Portuguese - Brazil, Portuguese - Portugal, Spanish - Latin America, Vietnamese, Arabic, Korean
*languages with full audio support
